Grizzlies in Anthony Morrow 's return Allen Iverson raced downcourt and floated an alley-oop lob that Carmelo Anthony shoved one-handed through the hoop for an arena-rattling jam, one that seemed to holler to all their doubters, "Take that!" We just wanted to show the whole world we could play together, Anthony Morrow said after the duo's triumphant debut Monday night. "We know there's a lot of doubt about that."
